sentence: Mars is the fourth planet from the sun.
sentence_tra: 火星是距离太阳第四近的星球。

sentence: You need a spacesuit when you're outside in space.
sentence_tra: 在外太空时，你需要穿太空服。

mean_cn: n. 隆隆声;  繁荣、景气;  激增;  vi. 发出低沉有回响的声音;  迅速发展, 蓬勃发展;  vt. 以低沉有回响的声音发出;  使迅速发展;
sentence: The bombs went off with a loud "BOOM!".
sentence_tra: 炸弹爆炸的时候发出隆隆的一声巨响 。

mean_cn: n.行为v.做；指挥；传导（电、热等）
sentence: Both of these children need to be taught better conduct.
sentence_tra: 两个小朋友都需要被纠正行为。

sentence: The fireworks explosions were deafening.
sentence_tra: 烟火爆炸（的声音）震耳欲聋。

mean_cn: n. 远征队;  探险;  短途旅行;  迅速;
sentence: They went on a mountain expedition.
sentence_tra: 他们去山上徒步探险。

mean_cn: n. 记号，符号；标志v. 签署
sentence: Please sign your name on the dotted line.
sentence_tra: 请在虚线上签名。

sentence: The froth on the beer is carbon dioxide bubbles.
sentence_tra: 啤酒上的泡沫是二氧化碳泡泡。

sentence: Evaporating water rises to the clouds as water vapour, then falls as rain.
sentence_tra: 蒸发的水分以水蒸气的形式进入云中，然后变成雨落下。

mean_cn: n. 火星人adj. 火星的
sentence: If there were Martians, they'd probably be tall because of their planet's low gravity.
sentence_tra: 如果火星人真的存在，他们可能会很高，因为他们的星球引力很小。

sentence: The greenhouse effect traps heat from the sun and keeps the earth warm.
sentence_tra: 温室效应能锁定来自太阳的热量并使地球升温。

sentence: Ice melts and turns into water if it's hot enough.
sentence_tra: 如果足够热，冰块便会融化并变成水。

sentence: This scale converts dollars to euros.
sentence_tra: 这个比例可以把美元换算成欧元。

mean_cn: n. 代表团;  任务, 使命;  vt. 派遣…执行任务;
sentence: The soldiers advance to complete the mission.
sentence_tra: 士兵们前进以完成任务。

sentence: It's so beautiful how the water reflects the sky.
sentence_tra: 天空倒映在湖面上，真是太美了！

sentence: It's important to wear breathable shoes and socks when hiking to keep your feet healthy.
sentence_tra: 为了脚部健康，徒步时穿上透气的鞋袜是很重要的。

sentence: The teacher invites students to go up to the board and write the correct answers.
sentence_tra: 老师请了学生们上台写出正确答案。

sentence: Things fall down because of gravity.
sentence_tra: 物体会坠落是因为重力。

sentence: Water vapour arose from the boiling pool.
sentence_tra: 水蒸气从沸腾的池塘中升起。

sentence: Interplanetary trips, like a trip to Saturn, would take dozens of years.
sentence_tra: 飞到土星这样的星际旅行会花费数十年的时间。

mean_cn: vt. 消耗, 耗尽;  吃光, 喝光;  毁灭;
sentence: This girl consumes a lot of fruit.
sentence_tra: 小妹妹吃了很多水果。

sentence: Camels have fatty humps that allow them to retain water.
sentence_tra: 骆驼身上充满脂肪的驼峰可以帮它们储存水。

mean_cn: n. 变化, 改造, 转变;
sentence: She went through a significant transformation in the last 4 years.
sentence_tra: 她在过去的四年里经历了巨大的变化。

mean_cn: n. 轨道;  vt. 环绕…的轨道运行;  vi. 环绕…的轨道运行;
sentence: All of the planets orbit the sun.
sentence_tra: 在太阳系里，所有星球环绕太阳运行。

sentence: When I dream of sheep, it helps me sleep.
sentence_tra: 我梦羊时有助睡眠。

mean_cn: n. 极线;  adj. 磁极的;  指引的;  中枢的;  极地的;
sentence: Temperature in the polar region remains much lower than 0 degrees.
sentence_tra: 极地地区的温度远低于零摄氏度。

mean_cn: phr. 变为现实; 成为事实;
sentence: Do you believe in genies who can make your wishes come true?
sentence_tra: 你相信能让你梦想成真的精灵吗？

sentence: The red rocket is flying over the clouds.
sentence_tra: 这枚红色的火箭冲上云端。

mean_cn: adj. 太阳的；太阳系的；日光的
sentence: Solar energy is necessary for life.
sentence_tra: 太阳能是生命所需。

sentence: A convertible car can transform its shape.
sentence_tra: 敞篷车能改变自己的外形。

sentence: We must breathe oxygen to live.
sentence_tra: 我们必须吸进氧气来生存。

sentence: The birds migrate south for the winter.
sentence_tra: 有些鸟类会为（躲避）冬天而迁徙南方。

mean_cn: n. 领带;  关系;  束缚;  vi. 系;  打结;  打成平局;  vt. 系;  打, 打结;
sentence: I just learned how to tie a necktie around my neck.
sentence_tra: 我刚刚学会系领带。

mean_cn: adj. 由人操作的；载人的 动词man的过去式和过去分词.
sentence: This is a manned space shuttle.
sentence_tra: 这是一艘载人航天飞船。

sentence: He was the only inhabitant of the island.
sentence_tra: 他是这个岛上唯一的居民。

mean_cn: n.登陆，着陆，码头，楼梯平台，降落
sentence: The most difficult part of flying an airplane is the landing.
sentence_tra: 开飞机最难的部分就是降落。

mean_cn: adj. 电子的;  利用电子系统的;  用电子操控的
sentence: The DJ played electronic music at the party.
sentence_tra: DJ在聚会上放电子音乐。

sentence: The city is always packed with people but you get used to it after a while.
sentence_tra: 城市总是挤满了人，但你不久就会习惯了。

sentence: It's easy to distinguish the yellow pencil from the black pencils.
sentence_tra: 从黑色铅笔中区分出黄色铅笔很容易。

mean_cn: n. 头戴式受话器, 耳机;
sentence: She wears a headset listening to music.
sentence_tra: 她戴着耳机听音乐。

sentence: He brought special equipment to fix the water leak.
sentence_tra: 他带了特殊器械来修理漏水。

sentence: It's only thanks to my rescuer that I am still alive.
sentence_tra: 多亏了我的救命恩人，我才能活下来。

mean_cn: n. 中间物;  媒介物;  方法;  adj. 中等的, 适中的;
sentence: I'd like a medium sized television.
sentence_tra: 我想要中等尺寸的电视。

mean_cn: adj. 有关的; 关切的, 担心的;
sentence: Mark looks concerned with his work.
sentence_tra: Mark看起来很担心他的工作。

sentence: Switching it to "on" will enable the fire security system.
sentence_tra: 把这个换到“打开”的位置就可以启动火警安全系统。

mean_cn: n.评论家，批判者，挑剔的人
sentence: I enjoy working as a movie critic.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢做电影评论家。

sentence: He was a powerful leader.
sentence_tra: 他曾是一个强有力的领导。

sentence: It's 2012 right now, but before long it'll be 2013.
sentence_tra: 现在是2012，不久以后将是2013.

sentence: She observes the liquid very carefully.
sentence_tra: 她观察液体时十分仔细。

sentence: This X-ray image shows me you need to take more care of your teeth.
sentence_tra: 这张X光片告诉我，你需要多多照顾你的牙齿。

sentence: I loved the performance--my favorite part was their costumes.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢这场表演，我最爱的部分是他们的戏服。

sentence: Pulling a rabbit out of a hat is the most classic magic trick.
sentence_tra: 从帽子里拉出一只兔子是最经典的魔术戏法。

sentence: This factory manufactures a hundred cars a day.
sentence_tra: 这个工厂每天能生产一百辆车。

mean_cn: vt. 委托;  监禁;  把…关进;  犯罪;
sentence: If you commit a crime, the police will put you into prison.
sentence_tra: 如果你犯罪了，警察就会把你送进监狱。

sentence: Their actions were friendly, but in reality they hated each other.
sentence_tra: 表面上他们彼此很友好，但是实际上却相互仇恨。

sentence: The zoo keeper hand-feeds the baby tiger everyday.
sentence_tra: 饲养员每天都手动给老虎宝宝喂食。

sentence: It's always a shock when you first step into cold water.
sentence_tra: 每次初踏冷水，总是令人震撼。

mean_cn: adj. 实质上的;  【计算机】虚拟的; 十分接近的;
sentence: Our company created a virtual store on the internet to sell our products on-line.
sentence_tra: 我们公司在互联网上开了家虚拟商店，在线销售我们的商品。

sentence: In winter, I prefer shirts with long sleeves.
sentence_tra: 冬天，我比较喜欢长袖衬衫。

sentence: Please enter the data into the database.
sentence_tra: 请往资料库中输入数据。

sentence: The boy is playing a virtual reality video game.
sentence_tra: 这男孩正在玩一款虚拟现实游戏。

sentence: I can take my laptop with me anywhere.
sentence_tra: 我可以随处带着我的笔记本电脑。

mean_cn: vi. 搬家;  离开;  vt. 搬开;  移动;  除掉;
sentence: Use the other end of the hammer to remove nails.
sentence_tra: 用锤子的另一端去拔除钉子。

sentence: He is reaching out to a friend who needs help.
sentence_tra: 他正向需要帮助的朋友伸出援手。

sentence: There are many scientists doing experiments to find a cure.
sentence_tra: 为了找到治愈方法，许多科学家在进行实验。

mean_cn: v.敲打；打败；心跳；搅拌n.敲打；拍子
sentence: I beat the meat flat so we can make hamburgers.
sentence_tra: 我砸平这块肉，我们就能做汉堡了。

sentence: I can't focus on my work with such a lovely keyboard.
sentence_tra: 用这么萌的键盘简直让我都不能专心工作了。

sentence: We jump out of airplanes for the thrill of it.
sentence_tra: 为了寻求刺激，我们从飞机上跳了下来。

sentence: 100 million years ago, dinosaurs ruled the Earth.
sentence_tra: 1亿年前,恐龙统治着地球。

sentence: I want a new, flat screen computer monitor.
sentence_tra: 我想要一个新的纯平电脑显示器。

sentence: I had my mechanic inspect the car before I bought it.
sentence_tra: 在购买之前，我让技师先检查了一遍这部车。

mean_cn: adv. 现在, 目前, 当前;
sentence: Google's stock price is currently around $600 per share.
sentence_tra: 谷歌现在的股价是每股600美金左右。

sentence: Iron is a very hard metal which is used to make engines.
sentence_tra: 钢铁是一种坚硬的金属，它常被用来制作引擎。

sentence: It's easy to distinguish the blue man from the gray men.
sentence_tra: 很容易就能把小蓝人从小灰人中辨别出来。

mean_cn: n. 部分；角色；零件adj. 部分的v. 分离；分配；断裂；分手adv. 部分地
sentence: You can have part of the watermelon; I'll eat the rest.
sentence_tra: 你可以吃一部分西瓜，我吃剩下的。

sentence: Every week I measure my waist to see how much weight I've lost.
sentence_tra: 每周我都量一下腰围来看我掉了多少斤肉。

sentence: The grey clouds suggest that it is likely to rain.
sentence_tra: 乌云说明很可能会下雨了。

mean_cn: n.服务，帮助；公共设施，公用事业；维修保养；服务机构　　v.维修；保养
sentence: I like to leave a good tip after a meal if  we've had good service.
sentence_tra: 如果我们的晚餐有很好的服务，我会给不错的小费。

sentence: I may be an adult, but I like to read children's books.
sentence_tra: 我是个成年人，但我喜欢看小孩子的书。

sentence: Water came out of the wall through several outlets.
sentence_tra: 墙上的水从几个出口排了出来。

mean_cn: 设立，创立；提议，提倡；预备；（军事）训练
sentence: We set up our tent by the shore of the lake.
sentence_tra: 我们在湖岸边扎起了帐篷。

sentence: They liked going to the restaurant and making their own food in the hotpot.
sentence_tra: 他们喜欢去餐馆吃自助火锅。

sentence: It's a chain store, so you can find them in any city.
sentence_tra: 这是一家连锁店，所以你可以在任何一个城市找到它们。

sentence: Rabbits run very swiftly!
sentence_tra: 兔子跑得很快！

sentence: Oh, no! Masked villains want to take over our city!
sentence_tra: 哦，不！戴面具的坏人想占领我们的城市！

sentence: You can ask any of our staff for help.
sentence_tra: 你可以向我们的任何职员请求帮助。

mean_cn: n. 讲台;  看台;  vi. 站立;  起立;  vt. 使站立;  忍耐;  抵御;
sentence: My dog can stand on two feet and she can even put on her own shoes!
sentence_tra: 我的狗能双脚站立，它甚至能自己穿鞋！

sentence: He was excited about his ownership of a new car.
sentence_tra: 拥有一辆新车真让他感到兴奋。

mean_cn: adv. 也;  和;  此外
sentence: My dog as well as his dog are wearing funny hats and sunglasses.
sentence_tra: 我的狗和他的狗都戴着奇怪的帽子和眼镜。

sentence: When the leaf is seen up close, you can see a lot of fine details.
sentence_tra: 近距离看树叶时，你可以看到很多的细节。

mean_cn: n.树枝；分支(学科)；部门 ；办事处
sentence: I climbed a rope tied around a tree branch.
sentence_tra: 我沿着捆绑在树枝上的绳子爬上去。

mean_cn: n. (全天或长时间营业的)便利商店
sentence: They might be small, but convenience stores sell many useful products.
sentence_tra: 它们是很小但很方便的商店，卖各种各样实用的产品。

sentence: Let's just pop into the store and see if they have any nice clothes!
sentence_tra: 咱去店里潇洒走一回吧，看看有没有漂亮衣服！

sentence: The car park is almost full.
sentence_tra: 停车场几乎满了。

sentence: California is a state in the United States of America.
sentence_tra: 加利福尼亚是美国的一个州。

sentence: I went to the bakery to buy some bread.
sentence_tra: 我去面包店买了一些面包。

sentence: My lovely wife meets all my needs.
sentence_tra: 我亲爱的老婆能满足我所有的需求。

sentence: There's a wide range of fruit and vegetables to choose from.
sentence_tra: 这里有各式各样的水果和蔬菜可选择。

sentence: Make sure to pack all your clothing for the trip!
sentence_tra: 确保打包好所有你这次旅行需要的衣服。

sentence: He didn't know what it was, but he knew it was a bug of some kind.
sentence_tra: 他不知道它是什么，但他知道那是某种虫子。

mean_cn: vi. 膨胀;  展开;  进一步阐述;  变得和蔼可亲;  vt. 扩大;  使伸开;  详细展开;
sentence: As the boy blows air in, the balloon expands.
sentence_tra: 随着男孩儿往里吹气，气球膨胀了。

sentence: The magician impressed the audience with his amazing tricks.
sentence_tra: 这位魔术师用他惊人的伎俩给观众留下了深刻的印象。

mean_cn: v. 创办，发起，起飞；开始从事n. 游艇，发射
sentence: The space shuttle launched into the sky in a cloud of smoke.
sentence_tra: 航天飞机在一片烟雾里被发射到天空中。

sentence: The Statue of Liberty stands for freedom and a better life for immigrants.
sentence_tra: 自由女神像是自由和移民们想要的好生活的象征。

sentence: The little girl is very tidy; she loves to clean the house.
sentence_tra: 这个小女孩很整洁，她喜欢收拾屋子。

sentence: At night, the bridge is well-lit.
sentence_tra: 晚上桥的照明很好。

sentence: I spend all my money on home appliances, like TVs and refrigerators.
sentence_tra: 我把所有的钱都花在像电视和冰箱这种家用电器上了。

sentence: Only company personnel are allowed into this building.
sentence_tra: 只有公司职员才可以进入这座大楼。

mean_cn: adv. 直接地;  立即, 马上;  靠近地;
sentence: \u201cYes sir, I'll be there immediately!\u201d
sentence_tra: "好的，我马上到！"

sentence: We import goods from China because they're cheap.
sentence_tra: 因为价格便宜，我们都从中国进口商品。

sentence: 2+2=4 is correct, no doubt.
sentence_tra: 2+2=4是正确的，毫无疑问。

mean_cn: vt. 建立;  确立;  使安全; 使成为
sentence: The People's Republic of China was established in 1949.
sentence_tra: 中华民族共和国成立于1949年。

mean_cn: n. 排;  变动范围;  山脉;  放牧场;  vi. 排成一排;  adj. 牧场的;  vt. 排列;
sentence: Try to keep your speed in the 40 to 80 kilometers per hour range.
sentence_tra: 尽量把你的速度保持在每小时40―80公里的范围内。

mean_cn: v.滚动，转动；使摇摆n.卷；隆隆声
sentence: Where is he rolling that ball?
sentence_tra: 他要把球推到哪里？
